title: Mac Crashes During installation
body: My friend has downloaded league of legends on his mac, however when he trys to install it, it crashes and he has to restart the installation to find it crashing again. He has tried to install it many times and hes had no luck. Please help me figure out how to fix this.

replies.body: This issue could be caused by an older installation setup, incorrect installer, or settings with your friend's mac.  As a first step, make sure that he's downloading the Mac Installer which is available in the[ drop-down menu of the Download page](https://signup.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload#).  Additionally, I recommend he goes through this [re-installation guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends#section-mac)to troubleshoot.  Make sure that he's using the instructions specific to his OS.  Hopefully, that will get him squared away but let me know if there are any issues.
Hes already downloaded the latest version, and the re-installation guide didnt help but thanks for trying

Bummer, but thanks for trying!  Have him submit a ticket, and our tech team can look into this further.  Ask him to load up the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#section-mac) which will automatically acquire some logs to attach, and will help us give some context on what's happening.
